outline:
1. to throw, cast, hurl, fling
    1. (Hiphil)
      1. to throw, cast, throw away, cast off, shed, cast down
      2. to cast (lots) (fig)
    2. (Hophal)
      1. to be thrown, be cast
      2. to be cast forth or out
      3. to be cast down
      4. to be cast (metaph)
kjv_def: adventure, cast (away, down, forth, off, out), hurl, pluck, throw.
strongs_def: to throw out, down or away (literally or figuratively)
